text:
@Mike_Pence Until they are born then they are on their own and mamma better get a job, right?

How about the INFANT #COVID19 CASES IN TEXAS???
Make sure to ask your boss when he comes back from golf.
... spread your bullshit elsewhere. https://t.co/J2xOuMSjme
